item_name: (New Launch) Amazfit T-Rex 2 Smartwatch 5 Satellite Navigation, Military-grade Toughness Fitness Watch with Heart Rate, Sleep, SpO2 Monitor, Sports Watch with over 150 Sports Modes, 10 ATM Waterproof, 24-day Battery Life
item_desc:
Amazfit T-Rex 2 Rugged Outdoor GPS Smartwatch | 15 Military-grade Tests | Ultra-low Temperature Operation | 10 ATM waterproof | 24-day Battery Life | Route Import & Real-time Navigation



























Dual-band & 5 Satellite Positioning
Go beyond adventure with the watch's dual-band positioning and support for five satellite positioning systems, which can effectively reduce environmental interference and achieve more precise positioning. 

Route Import and Real-time Navigation
Unleash your inner explorer and tread new ground by importing route files from the  Zepp App. Your movement along an imported route, and even your unique movement along your own developing route, can be displayed in real-time directly on the watch.

15 military-grade test & 150 sports modes
The shape of the Amazfit T-Rex 2 is tough and solid with distinct angles. Having passed 15 military-grade  tests, the watch can battle with you through hot deserts, humid  rainforests and polar glaciers. Witness endurance  that braves the elements with ease. 

24-day battery life & Always-On 1.39“ AMOLED display
Go more  and charge less with up to 24days  of battery life on a single charge  with typical use.
The  always-on AMOLED color screen with 454x454 resolution and 326 ppi means you don’t have to stop what you’re doing to check the time.

-30°C Low Temperature Operation
Built for the brave, the Amazfit T-Rex 2 is tough enough to be operated even in extreme temperatures as low as -30°C. So not only can the watch body physically resist the cold, but you can keep using the watch's functions as the conditions get more intense. Witness fortitude forged in ice.


Isi paket : 
1 x Smartwatch Amazfit T-Rex 2
1 x Kabel Charger
1 x Buku panduan manual
1 x Kartu garansi
